list-item.p: Zone 1: Floodplain (rice cultivation and dry season grazing)
Zone 2: Residential area (= village) & rainy season grazing area (= pastures)
Zone 3: Forest (people collect various resources, occasional grazing by cattle)
A: Ædes mcintoshi (residing in the floodplain zone, known RVFv vector with vertical transmission and dormancy in eggs)
B: Ædes ægypti (residing in residential and forest zones, known RVFv vector with vertical transmission)
C: Culex sp.1 (residing in the floodplain, exact species currently unknown in Kilombero Valley)
D: Culex sp.2 (residing in the residential and forest zones, exact species currently unknown in Kilombero Valley)
